column4: Hi, dist-upgrade'ed into breezy. Now x11 wont work... if i apt-get install x-window-system it complains about twm error... I know many ppl has been in this situation... Could anybody please tell me how to fix it? I sort of cant search the web in this terminal
also, the wiki has stuff on fixing that...apt-cache search surfraw apt-cache search lynx
thx i will check it out the official ubuntu wiki no?
